title: Attack of the Wall St. Titan
creator: Dark Tonic

extendedInfo.description: Selected by Indie Game Magazine as one of the best mobile arcade games of 2012! German version available: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.immanitasentertainment.boersentitanâ Physics based destructionâ Tons of fun mini-objectivesâ Insane powerupsâ Hit all the score targets and remove all ads for free!A giant robot, built to destroy and subjugate the masses. Reprogrammed by an anonymous hacktivist to turn on your evil corporate creators, you are the Wall Street Titan.  Clash with the military, crush cars & tanks!  Occupy Wall Street with a giant robot fist! ââ What is the press saying? âââ "...Wall Street Titan manages to be a deep arcade shoot âem up that just happens to have a cool modern-day premise to boot." Rating: 88/100, One of the best mobile action games of 2012- Indie Game Magazine â "...a quickfire, fun smash-em-up arcade game with a cracking graphic style and a darkly humorous political edge."- GGSGamer.comâ "...the addictive arcade style action and sheer amount of fun destruction ... makes this free title worth checking out."- SCI-FI-LONDONâ "People, if weâve learned anything from science fiction, itâs that you donât build giant robots with the blind hope that you can control them. reviews.title: Strangely compelling
reviews.comment: Very strange but quite frenetic. I ended up just pounding the screen! Would be happy to pay for this to get rid of the adverts.
reviews.author: Robert Cross

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: A good different kinda a game,should play. Its better than the ant smasher, instead of ants u gotta destroy The Money Street aka wall street. So without thinking twice download and spend the entire weekend with great fun. Cheers
reviews.author: seemant deshwal

reviews.comment: Almost the funniest  and fun game I ever played

reviews.title: Well done!
reviews.comment: Excellent blitz game. The quick levels are great for when you don\'t have much time and want to get in some fun gaming. Good show, Dark Tonic.
reviews.author: Travis Terlinden

reviews.title: It works on other phone...
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game but when I try to install it it says it cannot install on usb stick. What does that even mean?
reviews.author: Edgar Farias

reviews.title: Would give 5 but...
reviews.comment: Great game, awesome variation on \"smash\" games, love the variety of powerups. But definetly needs more levels cuz 3 is a little lacking by any standard , and maybe another attack or 3, say arm sweep.love the potential, but \"variety is the spice of life\" and video games! Id pay a few bucks for a 10level  pack fer sure   Ps. Enemy packs! i.e. ninjas, aliens, undead etc.
reviews.author: rob blatt

reviews.title: Aaahhh Freaking Finger Cramp
reviews.comment: Love it, love it, love it....the sound, graphics, story line & all around intensity of tapping everything. Great for teaching my younglings hand & eye coordination as well as keeping mine tweaked. Keep up the great work and pay no attention to the  negative remarks from people who feel things for free need meet their high expectations.
reviews.author: Richard Kaylie

reviews.title: Great and amazing
reviews.comment: Nothing to say but playing it is really fun!! Good jib!!!
